mapper.insert: insert into board values(SEQ_BOARD_NO.nextval, #{memberId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, default, default, default)
mapper.update: update board set BOARD_TITLE=#{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT=#{boardContent} where BOARD_NO =#{boardNo}
update board set DEL_YN = 'Y' where BOARD_NO =#{boardNo}
mapper.select: select B.BOARD_NO, B.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.BOARD_DATE, M.ADMIN_YN, B.DEL_YN from board B join member M on B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID where M.ADMIN_YN = 'Y' and B.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY M.ADMIN_YN DESC, B.BOARD_DATE DESC

select B.BOARD_NO, B.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.BOARD_DATE, M.ADMIN_YN, B.DEL_YN from board B join member M on B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID where M.ADMIN_YN = 'N' and B.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY M.ADMIN_YN DESC, B.BOARD_DATE DESC

select B.BOARD_NO, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.BOARD_DATE, B.DEL_YN from board B join member M on B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID where B.DEL_YN = 'N' and B.BOARD_NO=#{boardNo} ORDER BY B.BOARD_DATE DESC

select B.BOARD_NO, B.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.BOARD_DATE, M.ADMIN_YN, B.DEL_YN from board B join member M on B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID
M.ADMIN_YN = 'Y' and B.DEL_YN = 'N'
and B.BOARD_TITLE like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and B.BOARD_CONTENT like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and M.MEMBER_NICKNAME like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and B.BOARD_TITLE like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' or B.BOARD_CONTENT like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' or M.MEMBER_NICKNAME like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY M.ADMIN_YN DESC, B.BOARD_DATE DESC

select B.BOARD_NO, B.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.BOARD_DATE, M.ADMIN_YN, B.DEL_YN from board B join member M on B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID
M.ADMIN_YN = 'N' and B.DEL_YN = 'N'
and B.BOARD_TITLE like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and B.BOARD_CONTENT like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and M.MEMBER_NICKNAME like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and B.BOARD_TITLE like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' or B.BOARD_CONTENT like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' or M.MEMBER_NICKNAME like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY M.ADMIN_YN DESC, B.BOARD_DATE DESC
select count(*) from board where DEL_YN = 'N'

select count(*) from board B join member M on B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID
B.DEL_YN = 'N'

and B.BOARD_CONTENT like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and M.MEMBER_NICKNAME like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
and (B.BOARD_TITLE like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' or B.BOARD_CONTENT like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' or M.MEMBER_NICKNAME like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%')
select MEMBER_NICKNAME from member where MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
